comments.comment:
which is the best solution ?
removing the link replacing with http://web.archive.org/web/20070331065631/http://www.robinhewitt.com/research/track/camshift.html
if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shahianshu>@shahianshu</denchmark-link> is not working on the issue, I'd like to fix this issue. Can someone assign this issue to me?

maybe use <denchmark-link:http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.14.7673>http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.14.7673</denchmark-link>
that's a link to the original paper, not some seemingly random web page also, you don't need anything assigned. just work on it, then make a pull request.
